SCENEMESSAGE.Settings.BlueChecksHint: Use blue instead of green for hit checks vs AC (may be more red-green colorblind friendly).
SCENEMESSAGE.Settings.HideItemImgHint: Hides the item image on item chat cards for a smaller card.
SCENEMESSAGE.Settings.HideItemSubtitleHi: Hides the item subtitle on item chat cards. Caution: this may contain useful information in play.
SCENEMESSAGE.Settings.HidePortraitHint: Remove the portraits from chat cards.
SCENEMESSAGE.Settings.HideSubtitleHint: Hide the subtitle which shows the associated username
SCENEMESSAGE.Settings.PurpleWhispersHint: Makes the background of whispered messages a slight pinkish purple and labels them, to better distinguish them from public messages.
